newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* Changes have been made to the structure of the settings file. Downgrading to previous version will not be possible once upgraded. * Support of settings files prior of version 1.3.0 has been discontinued.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== New Features ==
* EVEMon now has a new tool (API Tester). * EVEMon now has a new tool (Characters Comparison). * EVEMon now can monitor a character's Contracts. * EVEMon now can monitor a character's Employment History.
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a visual bug where the tray icon popup window had not rounded edges. * Fixed a crash bug when comparing ships and one of them uses any type of isotopes. * Fixed a crash bug when applying specific filtering in skill browser. * Fixed a crash bug when a produced item from a blueprint is not included in our data files. * Fixed a crash bug when not using the default URL for Google Calendar. * Fixed a bug where priority and canceling the operation, where ignored when using "Set Priority When Adding Skills To Plan". * Fixed a bug where proxy settings password was not getting decrypted upon usage. * Fixed a bug when exporting/importing an Uri character. * Fixed a crash bug when trying to open different notification details windows. * Fixed a bug where the group selection was not taken into account when building the tree list upon initialization in Item browser. * Fixed a bug where a corp type API key has trying to call the AccountStatus. * Fixed a bug where corporation info of a character where not updated when updating the bind API key. * Fixed a crash bug when Outlook is chosen as External Calender but Outlook isn't installed. * Fixed a bug when rearranging columns in EVE Mail monitor. * Fixed a visual flickering when Overview was updated.
== Enhancements ==
* EVEMon can now use Outlook calendars other than the default (see 'Settings'). * Google calendar password credential will now be stored encrypted in settings file. * EVE ID to Name cache file is now handled in a way that prevent data loss. * Skill browser can now filter by attributes. * EVEMon will now automatically force a monitor to update if monitor's last update time is in the future. * A character's skills can be exported as a plan via the 'Manage Plans' and 'Characters Comparison' tool. * Selected character's skills can be exported as a plan via 'Characters Comparison' tool. * Scroll bar position is now persistent in all major controls when EVEMon updates.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better, faster and more stable application.
